item.title: SolRac - Majestic [Drum & Bass]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Meant to listen to this over the weekend but my weekends are jam packed.

The production is good, I like the samples you’ve used. This is going to sound silly but I wish at the end there was one more single note for the piano in the last scene to resolve the melody, I heard it in my head and was hoping for it but it didn’t happen

The track is a little thick (production wise) for drum and bass - usually a drum and bass track is propelled by the drums and the interplay with the bass. Lately I’m even finding more so the drums and percussion that’s packed in - sometimes I’m like “what’s going on” and literally it’s just drums and like a droning bass for part of some tracks.

Anyway, overall though you’ve put together a good track with a great vibe and I did enjoy

Read full topic
